query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tribunal_runs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  claimId INT NOT NULL,
  evidenceSetId INT,
  verdict ENUM('PASS', 'PASS_WARN', 'FAIL') NOT NULL,
  reasonsJson JSON,
  citationCoveragePercent DECIMAL(5,2),
  contradictionScore DECIMAL(5,2),
  evidenceStrength DECIMAL(5,2),
  uncertaintyScore DECIMAL(5,2),
  modelVersionHash VARCHAR(64),
  promptTemplateHash VARCHAR(64),
  analystOutput TEXT,
  skepticOutput TEXT,
  methodologistOutput TEXT,
  citationAuditorOutput TEXT,
  judgeOutput TEXT,
  publishableText TEXT,
  warningsJson JSON,
  whatWouldChange TEXT,
  runDurationMs INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_claim (claimId),
  INDEX idx_verdict (verdict),
  INDEX idx_created (createdAt)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4DB9hJWqLzCzJpD.4ae2ba9639dc --database XodoyKMzPdFiKkVj3QFTGK --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tribunal_runs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  claimId INT NOT NULL,
  evidenceSetId INT,
  verdict ENUM('PASS', 'PASS_WARN', 'FAIL') NOT NULL,
  reasonsJson JSON,
  citationCoveragePercent DECIMAL(5,2),
  contradictionScore DECIMAL(5,2),
  evidenceStrength DECIMAL(5,2),
  uncertaintyScore DECIMAL(5,2),
  modelVersionHash VARCHAR(64),
  promptTemplateHash VARCHAR(64),
  analystOutput TEXT,
  skepticOutput TEXT,
  methodologistOutput TEXT,
  citationAuditorOutput TEXT,
  judgeOutput TEXT,
  publishableText TEXT,
  warningsJson JSON,
  whatWouldChange TEXT,
  runDurationMs INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_claim (claimId),
  INDEX idx_verdict (verdict),
  INDEX idx_created (createdAt)
);
